channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bike lock planter box left on the kerb, 12th January
item.description:
There is a large planter box for locking a bicycle to left on the kerb outside 41 This is trip hazard and can cause restrictions when trying to open a car door This has been left there for also 2 months

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Roding Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole adjacent to Foots Cray meadows fence in Rectory Lane, 12th January
item.description:
Pot hole has been made worse from recent bad weather and as road is very narrow it urgently needs filling as cars can not avoid. It is deep and not noticeable when full of water.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rectory Lane, North Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole outside Plumstead Pantry caused damage to car, 12th January
item.description:
I drove over this pothole outside Plumstead Pantry / The Old Mill pub last night and the noise from the collision was so loud I had to stop the car. Fortunately I live very nearby so I slowly limped the car home but there's a clear clunking/popping/grinding noise coming from the front left wheel when I turn the car now so something is broken.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Warwick Terrace, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
